name: Billiards 3D Pool Game
description:
Improve your pool skills with this 3D game! Practice against the computer AI or challenge another person in two player mode.

≈ Features ≈
• Play against computer or choose two player mode
• 8-ball
• 3D experience
• Immersive environment
• Sounds
• Fast loading and smooth framerate

Get this game today and start practicing!

If you have any questions please contact us.
